alert.note: Alert for Chase; Deuel; Frontier; Garden; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 21 at 2:35AM CST until December 24 at 12:00PM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM NOON CST /11 AM MST/ TODAY TO NOON CST /11 AM MST/ SATURDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON CST /11 AM MST/ TODAY TO 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills falling to 45 to 55 below zero Thursday morning and 35 to 45 below zero Friday morning. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow and blowing snow expected resulting in low visibilities.. Total snow accumulations of around one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of panhandle and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from noon CST /11 AM MST/ today to noon CST /11 AM MST/ Saturday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from noon CST /11 AM MST/ today to 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Daytime wind chill values will remain below zero each day Thursday and Friday.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.

area.areaDesc: Chase; Deuel; Frontier; Garden; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; Perkins
